name: Axiom Alternative
description:
This game is a short, kinetic visual novel, independently written by Redewaan Duckett, giving an alternative take on the Welcome To... Chichester series.

The story follows several characters from the original series : The protagonist is harrassed by a small female and his secretary Lorinda, who in turn, causes trouble for anyone who tries to get near her boss.

Elsewhere, Lorinda's exploits are recounted by various other characters.
